tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ImageData (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    image_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE ImageMetadata (image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
image_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
image_path VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
image_size INT NOT NULL,
image_format VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ImageFeatures (feature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
image_id INT NOT NULL,
feature_data BYTEA NOT NULL,
feature_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP,
FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageMetadata(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImageLabels (label_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
image_id INT NOT NULL,
label_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
confidence FLOAT NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP,
FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageMetadata(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImageCategories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
image_id INT NOT NULL,
category_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
category_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP,
FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageMetadata(image_id)
);
